name: @mypreview/html-boilerplate
description: Simple boilerplate for building web app with babel-cli and sass.
author: Mahdi Yazdani

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: npx rimraf build/css/*.css && npm run lint:css && npx sass src/scss/style.scss build/css/style.min.css --style=compressed && npx postcss build/css/style.min.css --output build/css/style.min.css --no-map
scripts.build:js: npx rimraf build/js/*.js && npm run format && npm run lint:js && npx babel src/js/script.js --out-file build/js/script.min.js --no-comments --minified --presets=@babel/preset-env && terser --compress --mangle --output build/js/script.min.js -- build/js/script.min.js
